name: Inject'Em
description:
Story

Play a doctor in a grim sci fi roguelike who is determined to save his patients before they suffer a diseased death.

Objectives

Go through each ward in the Laboratory and cure the infected patients. As you progress  through the wards and combat infected patients you will learn new synthesis recipes, more information on their cheat sheet, for medication that you can use on said patient’s.

Features

  • Real time movement | Turn based combat
  • 2D Pixel art and environments
  • Singleplayer rogue-like campaign
  • Inspect, Inject and Synthesis medications
  • Free to play | Windows PC
  • Procedurally Generated Levels

Release Date

Downloadable for Windows PC.

Alpha Build - 15/12/2017
